title: Vasile Mirza
text: Vasile Mirza (born 26 July 1934) is a Romanian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20middleweight">men's light middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>.
